headline: Citi Lifts Caterpillar (CAT) Target as Construction and Mining Outlook Improves
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is included among the 15 Best Blue-Chip Stocks with Growing Dividends. On December 11, Citi raised its price target for Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) to $690 from $670 and kept a Buy rating on the stock. The firm updated its machinery group models as part of its 2026 outlook. Citi sees the most […]

headline: Is Caterpillar (CAT) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Caterpillar (CAT) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
